mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLIENT_INFO ( SEQ, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, TRAVE_CITY, PERIOD, EXPEND, TRANSPORT ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(seq),0)+1 FROM CLIENT_INFO), #{name}, #{phone}, #{traveCity}, #{period}, #{expend}, #{transport} )
mapper.select: select t1.SEQ, t1.USER_NAME, t1.USER_PHONE, t1.TRAVE_CITY, t1.PERIOD, t1.EXPEND, t1.TRANSPORT, sum(t2.USE_EXPEND) as USE_EXPEND from client_info t1 left join trave_info t2 on t1.seq = t2.seq group by t1.SEQ, t1.USER_NAME, t1.USER_PHONE, t1.TRAVE_CITY, t1.PERIOD, t1.EXPEND, t1.TRANSPORT
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO trave_info t USING dual ON (t.seq = #{userSeq} AND t.trave_seq = #{seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.trave_day = #{traveDay}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET trave_time = #{traveTime}, trave_city = #{traveCity}, trave_county = #{traveCounty}, trave_loc = #{traveLoc}, trave_trans = #{traveTrans}, trans_time = #{transTime}, use_expend = #{useExpend}, trave_detail = #{traveDetail} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (trave_seq, seq, trave_day, trave_time, trave_city, trave_county, trave_loc, trave_trans, trans_time, use_expend, trave_detail) VALUES( #{seq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSeq}, #{traveDay}, #{traveTime}, #{traveCity}, #{traveCounty}, #{traveLoc}, #{traveTrans}, #{transTime}, #{useExpend}, #{traveDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT trave_seq, seq, trave_day, trave_time, trave_city, trave_county, trave_loc, trave_trans, trans_time, use_time, use_expend, trave_detail FROM TRAVE_INFO WHERE seq = #{userSeq}
